channel.title: So Stupid
channel.description:
I cant play my server on my 64-bit vista lap top i click twice and the client crashes... ive looked at other questions the same and it dosnt work,.. i get this error
# # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d84a566, pid=4900, tid=6072 # # JRE version: 6.0_18-b07 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (16.0-b13 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x5a566] # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp #

i may have other erros as well

item.title: So Stupid
item.dc:creator: @iPENGUIN iPENGUIN
item.description:
@iPENGUIN wrote:

Try this:

Right click “runserver.bat” or whatever your runserver is and click “Edit”.

Paste this instead of whatever you have:

@echo off title YOURSERVERHERE java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17

If this doesn’t help, say so, I might have another idea.

Read full topic

item.title: So Stupid
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

i would just recommend trying to just dl other servers and try and use their “run” and such and keep trying till you find one that works

Read full topic

item.title: So Stupid
item.dc:creator: @eanhl2005 eanhl2005
item.description:
@eanhl2005 wrote:

no dude i tryed alot of clients and its not the souce i got 25 active players.and i can standstill and not crash, where could i find a 64-bit run

Read full topic

item.title: So Stupid
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

either its the client with the source, it just doesnt work or get a diff version of “run” for the client that works with 64 bit

Read full topic
